ClientWebPart.Name: ClientWebPart
ClientWebPart.Title: Important Messages
ClientWebPart.Description: Highlights important message content to site users.

Property.Name: maximumMessageCount
Property.WebDescription: Number indicating the maximum number of messages to display (leave empty to show all)

Property.Name: refreshInterval
Property.WebDisplayName: Automatic Refresh Interval, in seconds (leave empty for no auto-refresh)
Property.WebDescription: Time, in seconds, between refresh of the messages displayed (zero means never refresh)
